divs: Sighting Detailsjust laid down in bed when i seen what i thought was a bright star through my blinds. i got up and looked at it and thought maybe it was mars. laid back down and seen the object up higher in the blinds so i thought it was moving towards me.this is the fifth time i have witnessed an orb ufo. i walked outside and it was very bright moving about ten miles an hour overhead and to the left no sound whatsoever.looked the absolute same coming towards me, overhead and going away. the last one i seen i had binoculars and seen through the light to see a shape like a cross with a red light and blue light not visible without binocs. almost looks like you could throw a rock and hit them.very strange i wish i knew more about my sightings. my ex girlfriend witnessed three of the event on the nothside of springfield. she was stupified like me after every sighting
